Deemples is an all-in-one golf app that allows you to book your games (games/competitions/lessons), meet new golfers, pay in advance, and find the best rates online.

Easy golf booking & find golf buddies:
- Join any of the games available in your area in the app.
- If nothing fits, you can create your own golf game and invite other players to play.
- Why play alone/with the same few friends, when you can expand your network with Deemples?

Online payment & cheaper golf rates:
- Golf courses and game hosts can accept online payments and secure your golf bookings.
- Rates are usually cheaper than paying at the counter. (Currently only available in Malaysia)

Earn Deemples credits for your next game:
- Get instant cashback when you book and pay for your game.
- Refer a friend and you'll get RM20 when they book and pay for their first game. More referrals, more credits!

Handicap index:
- Deemples currently uses the USGA handicap formula and is not recognised or an official handicap of any golf club.
- Golfers use the Deemples handicap because the scores used to calculate the handicap cannot be submitted by them.
- This requires 2 other golfers in the Deemples game to submit the same adjusted gross score, course rating, and slope rating for the golfer in order for it to count for handicapping purposes.
- This submission method makes it the most trusted and non-manipulable golf handicap.
- The Deemples handicap will be moving to the World Handicap System in due time.

What if I'm new to golf：
- Join any 1-1 or group beginner lessons on the app.
- There are lots of beginner-friendly golf games for you to join if you want to get on the golf course.

Markets supported:
Deemples is currently available in Indonesia, Philippines, Singapore, Brunei, Australia and Malaysia. More countries coming soon.

The team:
We're a small and passionate team with the goal of helping golfers golf more anytime, anywhere. If you're keen in helping this cause, or have any questions related to golf, do reach out to us at hello@deemples.com.
